item.title: CVE-2023-24492|2023-07-11T21:36:52.664Z -- citrix -- citrix%20secure%20access%20client%20for%20ubuntu
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in the Citrix Secure Access client for UbuntuÂ which, if exploited, could allow an attacker to remotely execute code if a victim user opens an attacker-crafted link and accepts further prompts.
